topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack 2.0: Enabling Debug Logging

body.p: This page describe the procedure to enable EON service for centralized logging and changing EON log level to DEBUG.

section.p: To change the EON log level to DEBUG, do the following:

ol.li: In the logger section: INFO(default), WARN, DEBUG; set it ti default, to enable the log.
Edit the DEFAULT section in eon.conf.j2[DEFAULT] debug = True
Edit the logger_root section in logging.conf.j2[logger_root] qualname: root handlers: watchedfile, logstash level: DEBUG
Commit your configuration cd ~/helion/hos/ansible git add -A git commit -m "<commit message>"
Run the configuration processor, as follows: cd ~/helion/hos/ansible ansible-playbook -i hosts/localhost config-processor-run.yml
Prepare your environment for deployment:ansible-playbook -i hosts/localhost ready-deployment.yml;

section.p: To enable EON Service for centralised logging:

ol.li: Edit eon-api-clr.yml and eon-conductor-clr.yml files to set the value of centralized_logging to true as shown in the following sample:logr_services: eon-conductor: logging_options: - centralized_logging: enabled: true format: json files: - /var/log/eon/eon-conductor.log log_rotate: - daily - compress - missingok - notifempty - copytruncate - maxsize 45M - rotate 7 - create 640 eon eon - centralized_logging: enabled: true format: rawjson
Commit your configuration cd ~/helion/hos/ansible git add -A git commit -m "<commit message>"
Run the configuration processor, as follows: cd ~/helion/hos/ansible ansible-playbook -i hosts/localhost config-processor-run.yml
Prepare your environment for deployment:ansible-playbook -i hosts/localhost ready-deployment.yml;

body.note: To disable the centralized logging, set the value of centralized_logging to False (See Step 2).
